channel.title: Cpp on Juan José Gómez Simón
channel.description: Recent content in Cpp on Juan José Gómez Simón

item.title: OpenGL game engine in C++
item.description: ModelOne is primarily an early-stage game engine for Windows written in C++

item.title: Teselator
item.description: An application in which the user draws on a canvas and can convert it into tiles, which are 8x8 color-coded matrix, for use directly in DevKitPro

item.title: At Deaths Door
item.description: A prototype to show all the features of my action-adventure framework developed in C++

item.title: Inari The Forgotten World
item.description: Puzzle game that shows AI behavior and a quadrupedal movement system

item.title: Operation Crimson Day
item.description: Top down shooter with a wave system, entity manager system and dynamic music system when the difficulty increases.
